Title: Relates to requiring certain employers to register with the office of information technology services alert system
Summary: Relates to requiring certain employers to register with the office of information technology services alert system to facilitate the timely distribution of information from the state concerning critical information about emergency incidents or occurrences which pose a potential imminent threat to the health or safety of the employees of such employers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring certain employers to register for emergency alerts from the state of New York public safety alert mass notification system
